channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: IBM Blockchain Head: DLT is Transforming Global Supply Chains
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Samuel Haig
item.description: IBM’s head of blockchain in Australia and New Zealand has shared the firm's outlook for the integration of DLT into supply chain systems.

item.title: Bitcoin Rally Stalls at $10K But Dip-Buyers Should Watch These Levels
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Horus Hughes
item.description: Bitcoin has been unable to stay above the psychological barrier of $10,000 with just three days remaining before miner block rewards are cut in half.

item.title: China Telecom: Blockchain Has Significant Use-Cases for 5G
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Mohammad Musharraf
item.description: In a recent interview, China Telecom chairman said that blockchain has high-potential use cases to enhance 5G network services.

item.title: BitMEX CEO Expects Investors to Follow Paul Tudor Jones’ Move to Bitcoin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: BitMEX’s CEO expects that Paul Tudor Jones will bring more big investors to the crypto market by investing in Bitcoin.

item.title: South Korea to Develop an Identity Platform on the Blockchain for Autonomous Vehicles
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Mohammad Musharraf
item.description: South Korea’s smart city Sejong will be establishing a blockchain-based identity verification platform for self-driving vehicles.

item.title: Blockchain Jobs Are the Highest Paying Tech Roles in the UK
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felipe Erazo
item.description: A new study reveals that blockchain offers the best salaries in the UK’s technology industry.

item.title: Catastrophic Disruption or Healthy Rebalancing? How the Halving Will Impact Miners
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Samuel Haig
item.description: With the Bitcoin halving set to transpire in just a few days, analysts are predicting significant disruptions to mining operations.

item.title: China’s Blockchain Love Affair Continues With New Financial Pilot
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felipe Erazo
item.description: A pilot program is underway in Hainan’s province that aims to strengthen cross-border payments via blockchain technology.

item.title: Former Google Analytics Advocate Bashes Crypto Space
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Benjamin Pirus
item.description: Former Google analytics advocate and current CMO for software startup Think3, Adam Singer, went on a rant about the crypto space recently.

item.title: 5 Things to Do Other Than Worry About Coronavirus and Bitcoin Price
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By António Madeira
item.description: The Bitcoin halving and coronavirus are still dominating media headlines, here’s five things to do while waiting on both events to end.

item.title: Gibraltar MP: Unless Outlawed, Every Country Recognizes Crypto Payments
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Samuel Haig
item.description: Gibraltar’s financial minister says every jurisdiction recognizes crypto payments in the absence of policies explicitly outlawing them.

item.title: Google Searches for ‘Bitcoin Halving’ Skyrocket to Unprecedented Numbers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Michael Kapilkov
item.description: Google data shows unprecedented interest in Bitcoin’s block halving, far exceeding 2016 numbers.

item.title: Bitcoin Acceptance Skyrockets in Venezuela Amid Hyperinflation Crisis
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen O'Neal
item.description: As Venezuela’s economy continues to endure hyperinflation, more businesses start accepting crypto.

item.title: “I Can’t Wait to Throw Up Less Bitcoin,” Says Bitcoin Cartoon Hero
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph
item.description: Bitcoin from cartoon series “Bitcoin and Friends” shared his feelings about the upcoming halving and bullish view of his own future.

item.title: 66% of ETH Hodlers Plan to Stake at Least Some of Their Coins
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Samuel Haig
item.description: Two-thirds of Ethereum hodlers are planning on staking their coins when ETH 2.0 goes live in the coming months.

item.title: Bitcoin Went Parabolic The Last Time This Happened
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Michael Kapilkov
item.description: A key plateau was reached yesterday that is associated with some of the biggest bull runs in history.

item.title: Price Analysis 5/8: BTC, ETH, XRP, BCH, BSV, LTC, BNB, EOS, XTZ, XLM
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: After Bitcoin’s rally, several major cryptocurrencies are attempting to resume their up move.

item.title: Global Fintech Firm Launches Security Tokenization Platform
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Samuel Haig
item.category: security tokens Global Stock Exchange Group
item.description: Fintech firm GSX Group says their securities tokenization platform is phase one of its global security token ecosystem.

item.title: 22 More Crypto-Stealing Google Chrome Extensions Discovered
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Adrian Zmudzinski
item.description: A security researcher discovered another 22 Google Chrome web browser extensions that tried to steal users’ cryptocurrencies.

item.title: Bitcoin Pre-Halving Hash Rate Volatility to Shake Up the Mining Sector
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen O'Neal
item.description: As the halving approaches, Bitcoin’s hash rate sees major volatility. So what does it mean, exactly?

item.title: Algorand Partnership Offers Integrated Accounting to Token Holders
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Samuel Haig
item.description: Verady will integrate ALGO onto its crypto taxation platform Ledgible.

item.title: Belgium Losing $3.2M to Crypto Fraud in 2019 Is ‘Tip of the Iceberg’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Belgium’s economic inspectorate reported $3.2 million in losses due to cryptocurrency fraud in 2019.

item.title: Top Experts Make Bitcoin Price Predictions as BTC Halving Approaches
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Sentiment seems to be leaning to a big upside for Bitcoin following the looming block reward halving.

item.title: Bitcoin Eyes First 9-Week Bull Run as Options Open Interest Hits $1B
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC/USD is just 10 days from seeing nine weeks of back-to-back green candles for the first time in its history as the battle for $10,000 continues.

item.title: Tech Giants Are Role Models in Developing Cross-Chain Interoperability
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Consulting
item.description: Analysis of the challenges and benefits of creating blockchain protocols capable of true interoperability.

item.title: Bitcoin Suisse Seeks $50M to Become a Crypto Bank Unicorn
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jack Martin
item.description: Bitcoin Suisse is looking for almost $50 million of funding from investors to pursue expansion plans, which include moving into the banking sector.

item.title: Binance Hires Former HSBC Banker and Fintech Veteran to Lead UK Growth
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marie Huillet
item.description: Major cryptocurrency exchange Binance has hired banking and fintech veteran Teana Baker-Taylor to lead its expansion in the United Kingdom and European market.

item.title: Bitmain Exec Reportedly Arrested After Street Brawl With Co-Founder
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen O'Neal
item.description: Power struggle at Bitmain intensifies as the company’s executive reportedly gets arrested for partaking in a mob attack on the company’s ousted co-founder.

item.title: Proof-of-Stake or Proof-of-Work, That Is the Question
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Evan Weiss
item.description: An analysis of the advantages and disadvantages of the blockchain protocols that are the basis of the entire industry.

item.title: Zoom Acquires Encryption Startup Keybase to Fix Privacy, Security
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marie Huillet
item.description: Video conferencing app Zoom, the undisputed titan in an era of social distancing, has acquired end-to-end encryption start-up Keybase.
